  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>551a9706-43af-492f-b93b-7b425a994771#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A gombák országa</string>
            <string language="en">Land of fungus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land des Pilzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Terre de mycète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra do fungo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra del fungo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έδαφος του μύκητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pista del hongo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A gombák országának jellemzése - a gombák anyagcseréje és életmódja; a kalaposgombák, a penészgombák</string>
            <string language="en">Characterization of land of fungus - fungus' metabolism and mode of living; hatted fungus, moulds</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">rendszerezés,  rendszertan,  gombák,  </string>
            <string language="en">ordination, taxonomy, fungus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnung des Landes des Pilzes - 
Metabolismus und Modus der Pilze des Lebens; hatted Pilz, 
Formen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractérisation de terre de mycète - le 
métabolisme et le mode des mycètes de la vie ; hatted le 
mycète, moules</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caracterização da terra do fungo - metabolism e
modalidade dos fungos de viver; hatted o fungo, moldes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione di terra del fungo - metabolismo e 
modo dei funghi di vivere; hatted il fungo, muffe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηρισμός του εδάφους του μύκητα - μεταβολισμός 
και τρόπος των μυκήτων  hatted μύκητας, φόρμες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracterización de la pista del hongo - 
metabolismo y modo de los hongos de vivir; hatted el hongo, 
moldes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation, Taxonomie, Pilz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">classification, taxonomie, mycète</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ordination, taxonomy, fungo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ordination, tassonomia, fungo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χειροτονία, ταξονομία, μύκητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ordenación, taxonomía, hongo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
